item.text: Now I want to make clear for you, brothers and sisters, the gospel that I preached to you, that you received and on which you stand,

<st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="1223" class="">by</st> <st data-num="3739" class="">which</st> you are being <st data-num="4982" class="">saved</st>, <st data-num="1487" class="">if</st> you <st data-num="2722">hold firmly</st> to the <st data-num="3056" class="">message</st> I <st data-num="2097" class="">preached</st> to <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st>—<st data-num="1487 3361">unless</st> you <st data-num="4100" class="">believed</st> in <st data-num="1500" class="">vain</st>.

<st data-num="1063" class="">For</st> I <st data-num="3860">passed on</st> to <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> as of <st data-num="4413">first importance</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="3739" class="">what</st> I <st data-num="2532" class="">also</st> <st data-num="3880" class="">received</st>—<st data-num="3754" class="">that</st> <st data-num="5547" class="">Christ</st> <st data-num="599" class="">died</st> <st data-num="5228" class="">for</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">our</st> <st data-num="266" class="">sins</st> <st data-num="2596">according to</st> the <st data-num="1124" class="">scriptures</st>,

<st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="3754" class="">that</st> he was <st data-num="2290" class="">buried</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="3754" class="">that</st> he was <st data-num="1453" class="">raised</st><n id="1" /> on the <st data-num="5154" class="">third</st> <st data-num="2250" class="">day</st> <st data-num="2596">according to</st> the <st data-num="1124" class="">scriptures</st>,

<st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="3754" class="">that</st> he <st data-num="3708">appeared</st> to <st data-num="2786" class="">Cephas</st>,<n id="1" /> <st data-num="1534" class="">then</st> to the <st data-num="1427" class="">twelve</st>.

<st data-num="1899" class="">Then</st> he <st data-num="3708">appeared</st> to <st data-num="1883">more than</st> <st data-num="4001">500</st> of the <st data-num="80" class="">brothers and sisters</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="2178" class="">at one time</st>, <st data-num="4119" class="">most</st> <st data-num="1537" class="">of</st> <st data-num="3739" class="">whom</st> are <st data-num="2193" class="">still</st> <st data-num="3306" class="">alive</st>,<n id="2" /> <st data-num="1161" class="">though</st> <st data-num="5100" class="">some</st> have <st data-num="2837">fallen asleep</st>.<n id="3" />

<st data-num="1899" class="">Then</st> he <st data-num="3700" class="">appeared</st> to <st data-num="2385" class="">James</st>, <st data-num="1534" class="">then</st> to <st data-num="3956" class="">all</st> the <st data-num="652" class="">apostles</st>.

<st data-num="2078" class="">Last</st> of <st data-num="3956" class="">all</st>, as <st data-num="5619" class="">though</st> to one <st data-num="1626">born at the wrong time</st>,<n id="1" /> he <st data-num="3700" class="">appeared</st> to <st data-num="2504">me also</st>.

<st data-num="1063" class="">For</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">I</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">am</st> the <st data-num="1646" class="">least</st> of the <st data-num="652" class="">apostles</st>, <st data-num="3756 2425">unworthy</st> to be <st data-num="2564" class="">called</st> an <st data-num="652" class="">apostle</st>, <st data-num="1360" class="">because</st> I <st data-num="1377" class="">persecuted</st> the <st data-num="1577" class="">church</st> of <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st>.

<st data-num="1161" class="">But</st> by the <st data-num="5485" class="">grace</st> of <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st> I <st data-num="1510" class="">am</st> <st data-num="3739" class="">what</st> I <st data-num="1510" class="">am</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="846" class="">his</st> <st data-num="5485" class="">grace</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">to</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">me</st> has <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="1096" class="">been</st> in <st data-num="2756" class="">vain</st>. <st data-num="235" class="">In fact</st>, I <st data-num="2872" class="">worked</st> <st data-num="4053">harder</st> than <st data-num="3956" class="">all</st> of <st data-num="846" class="">them</st>—<st data-num="1161" class="">yet</st> <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">I</st>, <st data-num="235" class="">but</st> the <st data-num="5485" class="">grace</st> of <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st> <st data-num="4862" class="">with</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">me</st>.
Whether then it was I or they, this is the way we preach and this is the way you believed.
Now if Christ is being preached as raised from the dead, how can some of you say there is no resurrection of the dead?

<st data-num="1161" class="">But</st> <st data-num="1487" class="">if</st> there <st data-num="1510" class="">is</st> <st data-num="3756" class="">no</st> <st data-num="386" class="">resurrection</st> of the <st data-num="3498" class="">dead</st>, then <st data-num="3761">not even</st> <st data-num="5547" class="">Christ</st> has been <st data-num="1453" class="">raised</st>.

<st data-num="1161" class="">And</st> <st data-num="1487" class="">if</st> <st data-num="5547" class="">Christ</st> has <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> been <st data-num="1453" class="">raised</st>, <st data-num="686" class="">then</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">our</st> <st data-num="2782" class="">preaching</st> is <st data-num="2756" class="">futile</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">your</st> <st data-num="4102" class="">faith</st> is <st data-num="2756" class="">empty</st>.

<st data-num="1161" class="">Also</st>, we are <st data-num="2147" class="">found</st> to be <st data-num="5576">false witnesses</st> about <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st>, <st data-num="3754" class="">because</st> we have <st data-num="3140" class="">testified</st> <st data-num="2596" class="">against</st> <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st> <st data-num="3754" class="">that</st> he <st data-num="1453" class="">raised</st> <st data-num="5547" class="">Christ</st> from the dead, when in reality he did <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="1453" class="">raise</st> <st data-num="3739">him</st>, <st data-num="1512">if indeed</st> the <st data-num="3498" class="">dead</st> are <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="1453" class="">raised</st>.

<st data-num="1063" class="">For</st> <st data-num="1487" class="">if</st> the <st data-num="3498" class="">dead</st> are <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="1453" class="">raised</st>, <st data-num="3761">then not even</st> <st data-num="5547" class="">Christ</st> has been <st data-num="1453" class="">raised</st>.

<st data-num="1161" class="">And</st> <st data-num="1487" class="">if</st> <st data-num="5547" class="">Christ</st> has <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> been <st data-num="1453" class="">raised</st>, <st data-num="4771" class="">your</st> <st data-num="4102" class="">faith</st> is <st data-num="3152" class="">useless;</st> you <st data-num="1510" class="">are</st> <st data-num="2089" class="">still</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">your</st> <st data-num="266" class="">sins</st>.

<st data-num="686" class="">Furthermore</st>, those who have <st data-num="2837">fallen asleep</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="5547" class="">Christ</st> have <st data-num="2532" class="">also</st> <st data-num="622" class="">perished</st>.
For if only in this life we have hope in Christ, we should be pitied more than anyone.
But now Christ has been raised from the dead, the firstfruits of those who have fallen asleep.

<st data-num="1063" class="">For</st> <st data-num="1894" class="">since</st> <st data-num="2288" class="">death</st> came <st data-num="1223" class="">through</st> a <st data-num="444" class="">man</st>,<n id="1" /> the <st data-num="386" class="">resurrection</st> of the <st data-num="3498" class="">dead</st> <st data-num="2532">also</st> came <st data-num="1223" class="">through</st> a <st data-num="444" class="">man</st>.<n id="2" />

<st data-num="1063" class="">For</st> <st data-num="5618">just as</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="76" class="">Adam</st> <st data-num="3956" class="">all</st> <st data-num="599" class="">die</st>, <st data-num="3779" class="">so</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">also</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="5547" class="">Christ</st> <st data-num="3956" class="">all</st> will be <st data-num="2227">made alive</st>.

<st data-num="1161" class="">But</st> <st data-num="1538" class="">each</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="2398">his own</st> <st data-num="5001" class="">order:</st> <st data-num="5547" class="">Christ</st>, the <st data-num="536" class="">firstfruits;</st> <st data-num="1899" class="">then</st> when <st data-num="5547" class="">Christ</st> <st data-num="3952" class="">comes</st>, those who belong to <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>.<n id="1" />

<st data-num="1534" class="">Then</st><n id="1" /> comes the <st data-num="2673" class="">end</st>,<n id="2" /> <st data-num="3752" class="">when</st> he <st data-num="3860">hands over</st> the <st data-num="932" class="">kingdom</st> to <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st> the <st data-num="3962" class="">Father</st>, <st data-num="3752" class="">when</st> he has <st data-num="2673">brought to an end</st> <st data-num="3956" class="">all</st> <st data-num="746" class="">rule</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="3956" class="">all</st> <st data-num="1849" class="">authority</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="1411" class="">power</st>.

<st data-num="1063" class="">For</st> <st data-num="846" class="">he</st> <st data-num="1163" class="">must</st> <st data-num="936" class="">reign</st> <st data-num="891" class="">until</st> he has <st data-num="5087" class="">put</st> <st data-num="3956" class="">all</st> his <st data-num="2190" class="">enemies</st> <st data-num="5259" class="">under</st> <st data-num="846" class="">his</st> <st data-num="4228" class="">feet</st>.
The <st data-num="2078" class="">last</st> <st data-num="2190" class="">enemy</st> to be <st data-num="2673" class="">eliminated</st> is <st data-num="2288" class="">death</st>.

For he has put everything in subjection under his feet. But when it says “everything” has been put in subjection, it is clear that this does not include the one who put everything in subjection to him.
And when all things are subjected to him, then the Son himself will be subjected to the one who subjected everything to him, so that God may be all in all.
Otherwise, what will those do who are baptized for the dead? If the dead are not raised at all, then why are they baptized for them?

<st data-num="5101" class="">Why</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">too</st> <st data-num="2793" class="">are</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">we</st> <st data-num="2793">in danger</st> <st data-num="3956" class="">every</st> <st data-num="5610" class="">hour</st>?

<st data-num="2596" class="">Every</st> <st data-num="2250" class="">day</st> I <st data-num="599">am in danger of death</st>! <st data-num="3513">This is as sure</st> as<n id="1" /> my <st data-num="2746" class="">boasting</st> in <st data-num="5212" class="">you</st>,<n id="2" /> <st data-num="3739" class="">which</st> I <st data-num="2192" class="">have</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="5547" class="">Christ</st> <st data-num="2424" class="">Jesus</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">our</st> <st data-num="2962" class="">Lord</st>.
If from a human point of view I fought with wild beasts at Ephesus, what did it benefit me? If the dead are not raised, let us eat and drink, for tomorrow we die.

Do <st data-num="3361" class="">not</st> be <st data-num="4105" class="">deceived:</st> “<st data-num="2556">Bad</st> <st data-num="3657" class="">company</st> <st data-num="5351" class="">corrupts</st> <st data-num="5543" class="">good</st> <st data-num="2239" class="">morals</st>.”<n id="1" />
Sober up as you should, and stop sinning! For some have no knowledge of God—I say this to your shame!
But someone will say, “How are the dead raised? With what kind of body will they come?”

<st data-num="878" class="">Fool</st>! <st data-num="3739" class="">What</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> <st data-num="4687" class="">sow</st> will <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="2227">come to life</st> <st data-num="1437 3361">unless</st> it <st data-num="599" class="">dies</st>.

<st data-num="2532" class="">And</st> <st data-num="3739" class="">what</st> you <st data-num="4687" class="">sow</st> is <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> the <st data-num="4983" class="">body</st> that is to <st data-num="1096" class="">be</st>, <st data-num="235" class="">but</st> a <st data-num="1131" class="">bare</st> <st data-num="2848" class="">seed</st><n id="1" />—<st data-num="5177" class="">perhaps</st> of <st data-num="4621" class="">wheat</st> <st data-num="2228" class="">or</st> <st data-num="5100" class="">something</st> <st data-num="3062" class="">else</st>.

<st data-num="1161" class="">But</st> <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st> <st data-num="1325" class="">gives</st> <st data-num="846" class="">it</st> a <st data-num="4983" class="">body</st> <st data-num="2531" class="">just as</st> he <st data-num="2309" class="">planned</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> to <st data-num="1538" class="">each</st> of the <st data-num="4690" class="">seeds</st> a <st data-num="4983" class="">body</st> of <st data-num="2398" class="">its own</st>.

<st data-num="3956" class="">All</st> <st data-num="4561" class="">flesh</st> is <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> the <st data-num="846">same</st>: <st data-num="444" class="">People</st> have <st data-num="243">one</st> flesh, <st data-num="2934" class="">animals</st> have <st data-num="243" class="">another</st>, <st data-num="4421" class="">birds</st> <st data-num="1161" class="">and</st> <st data-num="2486" class="">fish</st> <st data-num="243" class="">another</st>.<n id="1" />

<st data-num="2532" class="">And</st> there are <st data-num="2032" class="">heavenly</st> <st data-num="4983" class="">bodies</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="1919" class="">earthly</st> <st data-num="4983" class="">bodies</st>. The <st data-num="1391" class="">glory</st> of the <st data-num="2032" class="">heavenly</st> body is <st data-num="2087" class="">one sort</st> <st data-num="1161" class="">and</st> the <st data-num="1919" class="">earthly</st> <st data-num="2087" class="">another</st>.
There is one glory of the sun, and another glory of the moon and another glory of the stars, for star differs from star in glory.
It is the same with the resurrection of the dead. What is sown is perishable, what is raised is imperishable.

It is <st data-num="4687" class="">sown</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="819" class="">dishonor</st>, it is <st data-num="1453" class="">raised</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="1391" class="">glory;</st> it is <st data-num="4687" class="">sown</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="769" class="">weakness</st>, it is <st data-num="1453" class="">raised</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="1411">power</st>;

it is <st data-num="4687" class="">sown</st> a <st data-num="5591" class="">natural</st> <st data-num="4983">body</st>, it is <st data-num="1453" class="">raised</st> a <st data-num="4152" class="">spiritual</st> <st data-num="4983">body</st>. <st data-num="1487" class="">If</st> there <st data-num="1510" class="">is</st> a <st data-num="5591" class="">natural</st> <st data-num="4152" class="">body</st>, there <st data-num="1510" class="">is</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">also</st> a <st data-num="4152" class="">spiritual</st> body.
So also it is written, “The first man, Adam, became a living person”; the last Adam became a life-giving spirit.

<st data-num="235" class="">However</st>, the <st data-num="4152" class="">spiritual</st> did <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> come <st data-num="4413">first</st>, <st data-num="235" class="">but</st> the <st data-num="5591" class="">natural</st>, and <st data-num="1899" class="">then</st> the <st data-num="4152" class="">spiritual</st>.

The <st data-num="4413" class="">first</st> <st data-num="444" class="">man</st> is <st data-num="1537" class="">from</st> the <st data-num="1093" class="">earth</st>, <st data-num="5517">made of dust</st>; the <st data-num="1208" class="">second</st> <st data-num="444" class="">man</st> is <st data-num="1537" class="">from</st> <st data-num="3772" class="">heaven</st>.

<st data-num="3634" class="">Like</st> the one <st data-num="5517" class="">made of dust</st>, <st data-num="5108" class="">so</st> <st data-num="2532">too</st> are those <st data-num="5517" class="">made of dust</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="3634" class="">like</st> the one from <st data-num="2032" class="">heaven</st>, <st data-num="5108">so</st> <st data-num="2532">too</st> those who are <st data-num="2032" class="">heavenly</st>.
And just as we have borne the image of the man of dust, let us also bear the image of the man of heaven.
Now this is what I am saying, brothers and sisters: Flesh and blood cannot inherit the kingdom of God, nor does the perishable inherit the imperishable.

<st data-num="2400" class="">Listen</st>,<n id="1" /> I will <st data-num="3004" class="">tell</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> a <st data-num="3466" class="">mystery:</st> We will <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="3956" class="">all</st> <st data-num="2837" class="">sleep</st>,<n id="2" /> <st data-num="1161" class="">but</st> we will <st data-num="3956" class="">all</st> be <st data-num="236" class="">changed</st>—

<st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> a <st data-num="823" class="">moment</st>, <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> the <st data-num="4493" class="">blinking</st><n id="1" /> of an <st data-num="3788" class="">eye</st>, <st data-num="1722" class="">at</st> the <st data-num="2078" class="">last</st> <st data-num="4536" class="">trumpet</st>. <st data-num="1063" class="">For</st> the <st data-num="4536" class="">trumpet</st> will <st data-num="4537" class="">sound</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> the <st data-num="3498" class="">dead</st> will be <st data-num="1453" class="">raised</st> <st data-num="862" class="">imperishable</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">we</st> will be <st data-num="236" class="">changed</st>.

<st data-num="1063" class="">For</st> <st data-num="3778" class="">this</st> <st data-num="5349" class="">perishable body</st> must <st data-num="1746" class="">put on</st> the <st data-num="861" class="">imperishable</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="3778" class="">this</st> <st data-num="2349">mortal body</st> must <st data-num="1746" class="">put on</st> <st data-num="110" class="">immortality</st>.

Now when this perishable puts on the imperishable, and this mortal puts on immortality, then the saying that is written will happen,

“Death has been swallowed up in victory.”

“Where, O death, is your victory?

Where, O death, is your sting?”
The sting of death is sin, and the power of sin is the law.

<st data-num="1161" class="">But</st> <st data-num="5485" class="">thanks</st> be to <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st>, who <st data-num="1325" class="">gives</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">us</st> the <st data-num="3534" class="">victory</st> <st data-num="1223" class="">through</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">our</st> <st data-num="2962" class="">Lord</st> <st data-num="2424" class="">Jesus</st> <st data-num="5547" class="">Christ</st>!
So then, dear brothers and sisters, be firm. Do not be moved! Always be outstanding in the work of the Lord, knowing that your labor is not in vain in the Lord.
